channel.title: Convincing a Streamer
channel.description:
What happened: Ive warned this streamer a few times talking outside of game can get him introuble but he ignores my messages https://clips.twitch.tv/ArbitraryDistinctBearFrankerZ soooo u might wanna hop into drchasedogs stream and tell him chatting out side of game is considered cheating ive warned him like twice now hes not even bothering in reading the chat Twitch
https://clips.twitch.tv/YawningGiftedCheesecakeKAPOW ....ive tried I give up have fun with him hes still doin it he jus told his friend he was 1
^^^^^^^^Clips included
What was SUPPOSED to happen: Him listen so I wouldnt have to take it this far hes New to the game and dont know how to read chat hes a newer streamer.. Community help me tell this guy plzzz
Steps to reproduce this issue:
1. Twitch Prime LoneLilly: U cant be doin that if ur playing with someone btw u can get into trouble 2. Twitch Prime LoneLilly: Talking outside of game is cheating if you cant say it in game dont say it at all u.u finding out who ur friends are outside of game is cheating aswell if a Dev of the game jumps into ur stream and sees it u can be banned 3. Twitch Prime LoneLilly: tryen to save u here dear

item.title: Convincing a Streamer

item.description:
This is definitely cheating – thanks, we’ll take care of it.
